body_html: As far as I can tell TF 1.6 also shows non-deterministic results on GPU. Has this been fixed in the master branch or a later release? If not, are there any plans to "fix" it? Even if not, in the mean time it seems very necessary to at least note this in the official documentation. Sorry if it is already there, but I was not able to find it (which suggests others might also not be able to).

body: As far as I can tell TF 1.6 also shows non-deterministic results on GPU. Has this been fixed in the master branch or a later release? If not, are there any plans to "fix" it? Even if not, in the mean time it seems very necessary to at least note this in the official documentation. Sorry if it is already there, but I was not able to find it (which suggests others might also not be able to).
